original_title: Bei den Tiroler Kriegsadlern im Winter
overview: On a military base, we follow the preparation of the Austrian planes and their takeoff to fly over and observe the Italian enemy. The pilot is equipped with a camera and maps. The strategic information collected by the captain is next passed on to staff headquarters to plan new attacks. This Austrian documentary from Sascha Film takes us to the heart of the Austrian-Italian conflict, in the Tyrol Mountains.
title: Bei den Tiroler Kriegsadlern im Winter
